Taunton.Richard Godfrey House:
The Richard Godfrey House is a historic house located at 62 County Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It is a 1-1/2 story, wood-framed structure, with a side-gable gambrel roof (with two gable-roofed dormers), a central chimney, and clapboard siding. The main facade is five bays wide, symmetrically arranged, with a center entrance that has simple trim.
